allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add renderer package with Vue, Vite, and Tailwind CSS

Set up the renderer Electron package with Vue 3, Vite, TypeScript,
Tailwind CSS v4, and shadcn-vue. Includes entry point, global styles,
utility helpers, and project configuration.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add shadcn/ui component primitives

Badge, Button, Card, Checkbox, Dialog, Input, Progress, ScrollArea,
Separator, and Tabs components built on Radix Vue.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Steam connection, item data service, and preload IPC bridge

Implement the main process backend:
- SteamConnection: auth \(credential + saved session\), GC inventory,
  storage unit operations \(inspect, deposit, retrieve, rename\)
- ItemDataService: resolves CSOEconItem GC data to human-readable
  names/images via inventory.json lookup \(skins, crates, collectibles,
  stickers, graffiti with tint fallback, music kits\)
- Preload: expose IPC channels to the renderer
- inventory.json: pre-built database for all 6 item categories

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add renderer app shell, pages, composables, and components

Build the full Vue frontend:
- App shell with Vue Router \(login → inventory → storage unit pages\)
- Composables: useSteam \(auth state\), useInventory \(items + search\),
  useStorageUnits \(inspect, deposit, retrieve, rename\)
- Pages: LoginPage, InventoryPage, StorageUnitPage
- Components: AppHeader, AppLayout, ConnectionStatus, CredentialLogin,
  ItemCard, ItemGrid, BulkActions, MoveItemsDialog, OperationProgress,
  RenameDialog, StorageUnitCard

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add item resolution documentation and casemove reference

- ITEM_RESOLUTION.md: documents CSOEconItem structure, attribute
  extraction \(166, 233, 80, 140, 277\), inventory.json key formats,
  resolution algorithm priority chain, and graffiti tint fallback
- logic-casemove-repo.md: reference logic from the original casemove
  project for comparison

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
